# Loading packages -----

library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggspatial)
library(ggthemes)

# Loading data ----

colleges <- st_read("https://bostonopendata-boston.opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/cbf14bb032ef4bd38e20429f71acb61a_2.geojson?outSR=%7B%22latestWkid%22%3A2249%2C%22wkid%22%3A102686%7D")

nhoods <- st_read("https://bostonopendata-boston.opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/3525b0ee6e6b427f9aab5d0a1d0a1a28_0.kml?outSR=%7B%22latestWkid%22%3A2249%2C%22wkid%22%3A102686%7D")

bike <- st_read("https://bostonopendata-boston.opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/1f63e8e31f664833827c407c021ad60c_0.kml?outSR=%7B%22latestWkid%22%3A2249%2C%22wkid%22%3A102686%7D")

# Plotting ----

college_plot <- ggplot(colleges) +
  geom_sf()

nhood_shp <- ggplot(nhoods) +
  geom_sf()
  
bike_line <- ggplot(bike) +
  geom_sf()

nhood_shp +
  geom_sf(color = NA, alpha = 0.5,
        aes(fill = "Boston Neighborhood")) +
  geom_sf(data = bike, color = "blue",
        aes(color = "Bike Routes")) +
  geom_sf(data = colleges, shape = 16, color = "red", 
        aes(color = "Colleges")) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = "yellow", name = "") +
